publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-489 Hugh O’Donnell: Valuable Assets - A Report into the Role and Status of Classroom Assistants in Scottish Schools—That the Parliament congratulates the Equal Opportunities Commission on the publication of its report, Valuable Assets, on the role and status of classroom assistants and believes that the report illustrates many of the vital roles that those employed as classroom assistants perform, that classroom assistants are now a vital part of the education system in Scotland’s schools, that their role should be formally recognised in any plans and policies relating to school education and that the recommendations of the report in relation to classroom assistants should be included in any such plans.

S3M-489 Hugh O’Donnell: Valuable Assets - A Report into the Role and Status of Classroom Assistants in Scottish Schools—That the Parliament congratulates the Equal Opportunities Commission on the publication of its report, Valuable Assets,on the role and status of classroom assistants and believes that the report illustrates many of the vital roles that those employed as classroom assistants perform, that classroom assistants are now a vital part of the education system in Scotland’s schools, that their role should be formally recognised in any plans and policies relating to school education and that the recommendations of the report in relation to classroom assistants should be included in any such plans.
